short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Moodle 教學錄影首選, 講解、錄影、上傳(Moodle/YouTube)一套搞定! (由維聖資訊 https://www.click-ap.com 提供)
short.en: The #1 screen recorder for Moodle. Also support upload to Moodle and YouTube.(By MoodleTW https://www.click-ap.com )

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
MoodleCAM 是一款錄影工具，可將桌面、聲音與相機鏡頭，進行錄影、錄音；提供講者快速備課工具，並可將錄製影片，上傳 YouTube頻道及Moodle課程內；是學校老師、企業講師、知識工作者的好幫手。
Moodle 教學錄影首選, 講解、錄影、上傳 Moodle 一鍵搞定! (Power by MoodleTW https://www.click-ap.com)

v9.1.5 新版使用檔案儲存(OPFS,可以儲存更大的錄影檔案); 增加多鏡頭及麥克風管理及切換.
Moodle is a trademark of Moodle Pty Ltd. Use of this trademark is subject to Moodle Permissions.
long.en:
Record screen activity, camera, mic, speakers for Moodle in HD video format (Power by Click-AP https://www.click-ap.com )

v9.1.5 Adaptive OPFS; Support multiple cameras and microphones.

Moodle is a trademark of Moodle Pty Ltd. Use of this trademark is subject to Moodle Permissions.
